content: {"name": "Fundaci\u00f3n Ni\u00f1o de la Caridad", "alternate_name": "", "description": "There's no specific schedule for the distribution but updates are posted regularly on their Facebook account: https://www.facebook.com/NinoDeLaCaridad/", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ninodelacaridad.com/contacto/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2467 Bathgate Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Belmont", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10458", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.85856649999999, "longitude": -73.8888181}, "phones": [{"number": "(917) 688-1098", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Check their social media for updates"}]}
